topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53dc816f6368726e64bd0000#post_53dc816f6368726e64bd0000
He's not exactly consistent. I'll stop talking about the GMOs in order to avoid a shitstorm and focus on his death threats.

Basically, he compared his critics to Nazis, and said it was the moral obligation of mankind to kill them for their "crimes against humanity". He then set up a site saying that "Monsanto collaborators" should be killed, and then tried to pass it off as a false flag operation by Monsanto.
